sense.def:
A flame
je dolg, zašiljen pramen gorečega plina, prihajajočega od nečesa, kar gori.

seg.quote: The flames and smoke rose hundreds of feet into the air.
The aircraft disappeared in a ball of flame.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
in flames
, gori.

seg.quote: My parents' home was in flames.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
bursts into flames
, nenadoma začne goreti.

seg.quote: The satellite burst into flames and disintegrated.
